definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
paragraph/section/segment/stage (of a process)/classifier for stories, periods of time, lengths of thread etc

sentences.english: Police in flak jackets are patrolling the districts hit by the violence.
sentences.chinese: 身穿防弹衣的警察正在遭受暴力攻击的地段巡逻。

sentences.english: Gold section head of gold, the owner often high in cost.
sentences.chinese: 黄金地段黄金市口，业主往往要价很高。

sentences.english: Universally terrifying , it is the most dangerous part of the southern route on Everest.
sentences.chinese: 每一处都令人胆战心惊，这是珠峰南线最危险的地段。

sentences.english: Lots lush green areas for you to enjoy.
sentences.chinese: 地段上郁郁葱葱的绿化区让您享受。

sentences.english: The house is in a central location with good access to the shops.
sentences.chinese: 这幢房子位于中心地段，离商店比较近。

sentences.english: The Pre-Sinian Darezha Formation is widely exposed in west Mianning.
sentences.chinese: 冕宁西部是康滇地区前震旦系出露较集中的地段之一。

sentences.english: Avoid overcrowded hubs to lower stress and save on taxes.
sentences.chinese: 避免过于拥挤的中心地段以降低压力，在税收上节省。

sentences.english: The technique for crossing a danger area is another form of bounding overwatch .
sentences.chinese: 穿越危险地段的技巧是掩护跃进的另一种形式。

sentences.english: The company is located in downtown lots Mackay, Hongkong garden nearby.
sentences.chinese: 本公司地处繁华地段麦凯乐后，香港花园附近。

sentences.english: The Forbidden City lies in the center of Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 紫禁城坐落于北京的中心地段。

sentences.english: In his sector, nothing had been gained by either side in this series of attacks and counterattacks .
sentences.chinese: 在这一地段，双方进行的一系列攻击与反击均无收获。

sentences.english: And part of the river's ugly and many of the bridges are.
sentences.chinese: 其实那条河，有些地段真叫人恶心，好多桥也是。

sentences.english: Located On Ravine Lot In Prestigious Joshua Creek.
sentences.chinese: 位于山沟地段在着名的约书亚河。

sentences.english: It really is a gold section of Chang'an District.
sentences.chinese: 是长安区名副其实的黄金地段。

sentences.english: You know that three million Hong Kong dollars is too high for this location.
sentences.chinese: 你知道三百万港币在这个地段来说太高了。

sentences.english: Now, the site of the Daming Palace is facing a new era.
sentences.chinese: 今天，大明宫地段正面临着一个崭新的时代。

definition: location/geographical position/position on a grid or spreadsheet, where 區|区 denotes the row and 位 the column
Laocheng district of Luoyang City 洛陽市|洛阳市[Luo4 yang2 shi4], Henan
to be right next to/close neighbor
building under construction/commercial property/real estate (for sale or rent)
